description: A day in the life of all characters: Kirino playing the latest eroge (loudly!), Kyousuke suffering from this, Kuroneko actually having family life, and Saori... well, she has quite a secret of her own.

titles.title: Ma petite sœur ne peut pas être fan de ce genre d`eroge
Ore no Imouto ga Konna ni Eroge Sanmai na Wake ga Nai
There`s No Way My Little Sister Can Play Eroge Like This
俺の妹がこんなにエロゲー三昧なわけがない
